title: Hotdog-Sandwich Taxonomy Framework

prerequisites: Secure buy-in from key stakeholder groups
steps.outcome: Create a legitimate, impartial body to oversee hotdog-sandwich taxonomy
risks: Difficulty achieving consensus on council composition and authority

steps.outcome: Define a taxonomy that recognizes both structural and cultural dimensions of hotdogs and sandwiches
risks: Resistance from purists on both sides

steps.outcome: Create practical guidelines for classifying borderline food items
risks: Potential for continued ambiguity and debate

prerequisites: Design fair and transparent adjudication process
steps.outcome: Provide a formal channel for resolving classification disagreements
risks: Potential for gaming the system or lack of compliance

steps.outcome: Increase public understanding and acceptance of the hybrid hotdog-sandwich model
risks: Difficulty overcoming entrenched beliefs and preferences

resource_requirements: Funding for council operations and public campaign
Expertise in food science, culinary arts, linguistics, and conflict resolution
